subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Where is everybody?
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
It does seem to have gotten quieter here. I think Frank left the group.

Zack


On Mon, Apr 23, 2012 at 11:29 AM, Misty <bulletbabea@...> wrote:

> People come and go as they wish. If you are looking for someone in

> your experiences, and try to meet some likeminded individuals.
>
> Misty
